授業目的: The key objectives of this course are to acquaint the students with the financial reporting system as per GAAP and IFRS and to increase their quantitative skills in analyzing and interpreting financial information. In addition, the course will adopt financial statements from real-life companies and academic cases to enhance students’ knowledge.
到達目標: After completing the course, students will be able to enhance their conceptual, analytical, and quantitative skills in analyzing and interpreting financial information. Emphasis is placed on understanding and evaluating the financial statements of real-life companies, followed by cases. This course is helpful for students who want to be financial analysts or management consultants.
授業方法: This course will be offered face-to-face. Students should have basic knowledge of accounting. This course is suitable for those students who want to be finance managers, private equity investors, entrepreneurs, financial analysts, and board members. Course pedagogy includes lectures, articles, and case studies to illustrate and reinforce concepts. Students are expected to have read assigned materials before attending every class. The instructors will supply all the reading materials in advance. Before the first class, the instructor will send students the lecture power points and reading materials. Please send me your email address to adhikarykobejp@gmail.com to get the necessary instructions on course-related information and reading materials.

All 14 classes are face-to-face.
Introduction and overview of the course- a conceptual framework of financial reporting-presentation of financial information as per US GAAP, Japan GAP, and IFRS.
Please send email at adhikarykobejp@gmail.com to get lecture materials
第2回: Definition of the elements of financial statements-key areas of consolidated financial statements- Chairman’s and Directors’ reports- notes to the financial statements based on a real-life company.
第3回: Horizontal and vertical analysis -trend and common size analyses.
第7回: Evaluation of financial statements- real-life company
第8回: Evaluation of financial statements- real-life company
